title: Linkin Park - 2008-03-04 - Los Angeles, CA
description:
Linkin Park
Los Angeles, California
Staples Center
4th March 2008

Setlist:
01. What I&#039;ve Done
02. Don&#039;t Stay
03. Somewhere I Belong
04. Wake
05. Lying From You
06. Papercut w/Points Of Authority outro
07. In Pieces
08. Numb
09. The Little Things Give You Away
10. Shadow Of The Day
11. Valentine&#039;s Day
12. Crawling
13. In The End
14. Bleed It Out
15. In Between
16. Breaking The Habit
17. One Step Closer
18. Faint

Source 1: Audio - SBD (LP LIVE)
Time: 87:39 mins
Format: mp3 / 320 kbit/s

Show Notes:
- Just like the Oklahoma show, the band changed the setlist completely because Chester was still sick. &#039;What I&#039;ve Done&#039; opened again, &#039;Breaking The Habit&#039; was moved down to the first encore, and the band did not play &#039;Given Up&#039; (their first show after the video was released!), &#039;Leave Out All The Rest&#039;, &#039;No More Sorrow&#039;, and &#039;Points Of Authority&#039;.
- &#039;There They Go&#039; was over the &#039;Points Of Authority&#039; outro, which was tacked on to the end of &#039;Papercut&#039; again.
- The show was sold out, and featured 360 degree seating.
- The &#039;Valentine&#039;s Day&#039; intro stuck finally, and it appeared on the setlist as &#039;Valentine&#039;s Day (w / gtr intro)&#039;.
- &#039;Bleed It Out&#039; on the setlist appeared as &#039;Bleed It Out (w / #5). 

An LPLive.net release.
Thanks to amarine88 of the LPU for the show.
